package.title: Work Package 1
package.subtitle: Project management and coordination
package.text1: Duration:M1 â€“ M36 Lead Beneficiary: 1 - UMINHO            Objectives:
package.o1: This WP1 will be focused on management of project activities, resources and costs as well as communication management, risk and conflict management, and project quality management.
package.o2: The Coordinator will be the principal responsible for risk and conflict management.
package.o3: Continuous reporting among partners and project management board meetings will contribute to the quality of project results.
package.d1: D1.1 - Minutes of the decision of the project management bodies.
package.d2: D1.2 - First year project management report.
package.d3: D1.3 - Second year project management report.
package.d4: D1.4 - Third year project management report
